tool_description: apiip.net is an API service allowing customers to automate IP address validation and geolocation lookup in websites, applications, and back-office systems.
name: IP To Location  - Apiip
title: IP To Location  - Apiip

api_list.name: Get IP data
api_list.description: Detailed information on our website: https://apiip.net/

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Specify a JSONP callback function name according to the [JSONP Callbacks](https://apiip.net/documentation) section.

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: An IPv4 or IPv6 address of your choice. or a comma-separated list of IPv4 or IPv6 addresses of your choice. (Limit: 50 values)

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Set to a 2-letter language code according to the [Specify Response Language](https://apiip.net/documentation) section.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Specify API response field(s) according to the [Specify Response Fields](https://apiip.net/documentation) section.

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: Set to json or xml to choose between output formats.
